extendedInfo.description: An ultimate force of heroes is gathering... do you have what it takes to join the Heroes War and save the world?Everything is on fire. But it wasn't always that way. I remember the first time I met Sylvia. She was beautiful, but could I trust her? I thought I could, and now there's only one way out of this mess. We have to recruit everyone we can. Vampires, Werewolvesâ¦ everyone. We need their help to get things together and discover the true nature of this Neostone. So are you with me?You can play Heroes War in English, German, French, íêµ­ì´, æ¥æ¬èª, ä¸­æç®ä½, or ä¸­æç¹é«.FEATURES- A visual style straight from the pages from a graphic novel!- Combat made simple with easy controls!- Play with your friendsâ¦ or against them!- Hours of mystery to explore and uncover!A whole host of heroic characters to choose from! - Dozens of heroes, each with their own special abilities!  - Calculate their strengths and assemble a heroic team of champions! Work with friends to clear dungeons! - Clear Dungeons with your friends and get special items!- Donât miss the exclusive limited-time Dungeons! Battle with friends and show them who's on top! - Receive special items when you battle against your friends and win! An action-packed story! - Whatâs Sylviaâs plan? Whatâs the secret of Neostone? Whoâs behind all of this?* This game is singleplayer only. If you wish to delete or reinstall, you can use the Com2us Hub data backup/restoration services in Options to save your data.* Items are available for purchase in this game. reviews.title: Great way to pass time
reviews.comment: Great game! I love turn based games. And so far this one is lots of fun. I definately recomend it.......except they did an update yesterday and now the game enjoy even open. Thanks for getting me addicted to a game that I can\'t play now :(
reviews.author: Patrick Maggio

reviews.title: Very gd game play
reviews.comment: Like the turn by the turn rpg like battle system but its suoer hard to get neostones n quite hard to get gold. The heroes r all so expensive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t play
reviews.comment: I can\'t log in. It drops me when I try to open the game. Really like it. Hope it gets fun soon.
reviews.author: Spencer K

reviews.title: I love the game but...
reviews.comment: I played it for a whole week non stop and then all of a sudden I can\'t reopen the game, it has to do with the latest update. PLEASE FIX THIS!
reviews.author: Jonathan Ilano Jr

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Crazy addictive, satisfying turn-based rpg with excellent art.  Can\'t play for more than a few minutes at a time though because of character energy.
reviews.author: Jon Krayle

reviews.title: Game won\'t open?!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been playing and spending lots of cash on this game(Rarely ever do it) and now all of a sudden the game won\'topen up because of this faulty patch update... Wooooow fix please Com2Us.
reviews.author: Swifty Swiss

reviews.title: Enjoyable
reviews.comment: For the moment, we\'ll see if its worth putting time more than usual.   Games decent and fun but shuts down a lot. Needs to be fix
reviews.author: Wad S

reviews.title: Fun turn based game
reviews.comment: Really like it. However I don\'t like the whole \"energy recharging\" thing. I don\'t want to have to pay to keep playing nonstop nor wait to play a game.
reviews.author: Max Shade IV

reviews.title: Fun game!
reviews.comment: I\'ve just started to play this game, but so far it is very fun and addicting! I like the turn based battle system a lot.
reviews.author: Shelby Fawaz

reviews.title: GREAT FUN!
reviews.comment: This game is another incredible Com2us mobile-device gave!  Quick fun, and a very interesting interface. Well done on creating ANOTHER amazing game!  :-D
reviews.author: Alexander Smith

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Art design  is pretty cool.  So far I like
reviews.author: Dannmarionne Jumaoas

reviews.title: Samsung note 8.0
reviews.comment: Cool turn based RPG, on par w/ squaresoft.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Lots if fun, just wish energy restored a little faster and I could level faster, but what\'s new.
reviews.author: Richard Weaver

reviews.title: Brilliant.Brilliant.brilliant.
reviews.comment: Good turn based game with a sweet twist on taking turns.
reviews.author: Jake King

reviews.title: Its really fun
reviews.comment: I like this game i may be a little ddrunk but its really fun
reviews.author: Roger Sisler

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: This game is one of the best rpg/adventure games ever! Com2us did a very good job on it! Nice graphics, nice story line, nice music... In sum, the best app in my tablet!
reviews.author: Felipe Silva

reviews.title: This game rocks!!!
reviews.comment: This game is cool and you don\'t have to spend that much money to play it I like the comic animation graphics and it runs really smooth on my tablet..
reviews.author: Guimy Etheart

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Nice animation, little redundant in the missions, but nice balance of challenging and rewarding.
reviews.author: Peter Kronschnabel

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Not a bad little game especially for free!
reviews.author: Shamayla Beekawa

reviews.title: Gr8
reviews.comment: Nice game. Easy to play. Gr8 fun.
reviews.author: Siddharth Das
